trans-unit.source: Defines the behavior for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref>.
Use WorkflowRuntimeBehavior to access the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object in your workflow service.
trans-unit.target: 使用 WorkflowRuntimeBehavior 访问<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>工作流服务中的对象。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is added by default when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> is created.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior"></xref> class.
This constructor sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> property to 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数设置<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A>属性设置为 10 分钟。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Not implemented in <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior"></xref>.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Configures the workflow service to support the workflow run-time behavior.
trans-unit.target: 配置工作流服务，以支持工作流运行时行为。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> extension and configures it for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A>扩展并将其配置<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The service description.
The service host.
Gets or sets a value that indicates how long a workflow instance stays in-memory in the idle state before it is forcibly removed from memory.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示多长时间工作流实例中的内存中保持空闲状态之前它从内存中强制移除。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> object indicating how long a workflow instance stays in-memory in the idle state before it is forcibly removed from memory.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>对象，它指示如何长时间工作流实例中的内存中保持空闲状态之前它从内存中强制移除。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Verifies the scheduling service used for workflow services has been added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> object and that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> object has not started before the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open*>.
trans-unit.target: 验证是否已添加到计划程序服务的工作流服务使用<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref>对象，并且<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open*>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open*>调用之前未启动对象

trans-unit.source: The service description.
The service host.
The wrong <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> is registered.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref> instance.
If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is not initialized before retrieving this property, then a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>对象未初始化之前检索此属性，则新<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>创建对象。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> object.
